Description: The function attempts to bind a ZeroMQ ROUTER socket to a port and returns the chosen port number. It does not log or return detailed error messages, system paths, configuration contents, or user data. The only information it exposes is the final port number (or -1 on failure), which is expected behavior for a network-binding routine and not inherently sensitive in this context. No additional internal details (like full addresses, stack traces, or configuration values) are exposed to an unauthorized actor by this function alone.
